1b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/bum phyo brgya sum cug
1b2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bzod po'i
1b3('bum): stsol tu phyin pa yod do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol
1b4('bum): tu phyin po yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod do//phyi
2a1('bum): /stong pa nyid yod do//phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//chen po stong pa nyid
2a2('bum): yod do//don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//mtha'
2a3('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do//
2a4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do//mi dmigs
2a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo
2b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do//yang dag par spyod pa rnams yod do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/
2b2('bum): dbang po rnams yod de//stobs rnams yod do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod de//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang
2b3('bum): do//'phags pa'i byiden pa rnams yod do//bsamo gtan rnams yod do//tshad med pa rnams yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
2b4('bum): 'jug pa rnams yod do//rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do//rnam par thar pa'i
2b5('bum): sgro stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yod do//mngon par shes pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//gzungs
2b6('bum): kyi sgo rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do//mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
3a1('bum): /yod do//snying rje chen po yod do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
3a2('bum): yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//dgra bcom pa nyid yod do//rang byang chub
3a3('bum): yod do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do//len
3a4('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do//dgra bcom pa rnams yod do//rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang
3a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod dro//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
3a6('bum): yod do//kau shi ka byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/
3b1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la las/bsam btan bzhi la bkod de/tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu
3b2('bum): bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //
3b3('bum): badre bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol
3b4('bum): tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau
3b5('bum): shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/zag po med po'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/de dag la bslabs shing /rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs
3b6('bum): kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo//
3b7('bum): 'thob par 'gyur ro//lon cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob
4a1('bum): /'thob par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to//thob sa/'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi rjed pa rnams
4a2('bum): kyis/rang byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyon
4a3('bum): med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs por sangs rgyas so//mngon pa
4a4('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka/zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha
4a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gton gyi pha
4a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
4a7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong po nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
4b1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi
4b2('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang //
4b3('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang //
4b4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma
4b5('bum): med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgra thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
4b6('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga'
4b7('bum): chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dag ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs
5a1('bum): kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/de bas
5a2('bum): 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe no/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/chos thams cad rgya cher
5a3('bum): bstan te/de dag yod pas/rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do///bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams
5a4('bum): yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do//mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod de/
5a5('bum): 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs pa kun
5a6('bum): 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do//snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//kun
5a7('bum): snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//chu dge'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//
5b1('bum): tshe ba'o lha rnams yod do//chung che'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//miche ba'i lha rnams yod do//mo gdung /
5b2('bum): lha rnams yod do//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//gya nom snang ba'i d+h+rU rnams yod do//'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams
5b3('bum): yod do//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//
5b4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bsam gtan
5b5('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod do//phyi stong pa nyid yod do//phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod
5b6('bum): do//chen po stong pa nyid yod do//don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
5b7('bum): yod do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//rang gi
6a1('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i
6a2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do//yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do//dbang po rnams yod do//
6a3('bum): stobs rnams yod do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do//bsam gtan
6a4('bum): rnams yod do//tshad med pa rnams yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do//rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
6a5('bum): 'jug pa dgu yod do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yod do//mngon par shes pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams yod
6a6('bum): do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do//mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do//snying
6a7('bum): rje chen po yod do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//phyir mi 'ong
6b1('bum): ba'i 'bras bu yod do//dgra bcom pa nyid yod do//rang byang chub yod do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa
6b2('bum): rnams yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do//dgra bcom pa rnams yod do//rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang chub sems dpa'
6b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//kau shI ka/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
6b4('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo laM las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/tshad med po bzhi dang /gzugs
6b5('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod namasra de'i
6b6('bum): rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bos rigs
6b7('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches
7a1('bum): mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhu na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstanaH/
7a2('bum): dag la bsgrubs shing /rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu me dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i
7a3('bum): 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob po/'thob par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong
7a4('bum): ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyu ro//dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
7a5('bum): rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' skyon med par
7a6('bum): zhugs par gyur to//'jug go//'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par
7a7('bum): 'chang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul
7b1('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
7b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyi dang /
7b3('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'odas pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams
7b4('bum): cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
7b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag
7b6('bum): bdun dang /'phagres pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgra
7b7('bum): dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshon ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad
8a1('bum): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa btso
8a2('bum): brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dag ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan
8a3('bum): to//kau shika/rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu ma/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du zlos shing /klag pa dang /zla ba dang //brten du
8a4('bum): bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las
8a5('bum): chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/de dag yod pas/rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim bdag gi rigs che
8a6('bum): zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do//mtsho ma'i lha rnams yod do//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams
8a7('bum): yod do//'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi sgra rnams yod do//tshangs ris kyi lce rnams yod do//tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod de//tshangs
8b1('bum): pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do//snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung snang gi lho rnams yod do//tshad mod snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//kun
8b2('bum): snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung dge'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//che ba'i
8b3('bum): lha rnams yod de//chung che'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi gdung ba'i lha rnams/
8b4('bum): yod do//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//
8b5('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//sbyin pa'i pha
8b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
8b7('bum): pa yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod do//phyi stong po nyid yod do//phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//chen po stong
9a1('bum): pa nyid yod do//don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
9a2('bum): yod do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//rang gi
9a3('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
9a4('bum): nyid yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do//yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do//dbang po rnams yod do//stobs
9a5('bum): rnams yod do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do//bsam gtan rnams
9a6('bum): yod do//tshad med pa rnams yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do//rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
9a7('bum): par 'jug pa dgu yod do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yod do//mngon par shes pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin
9b1('bum): rnams yod do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do//mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod
9b2('bum): dri/snying rje chen po yod do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//phyir
9b3('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//dgra bcom pa nyid yod do//rang byang chub yod do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//rgyun du zhugs
9b4('bum): pa rnams yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do//dgra bcom pa rnams yod do//rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang chub sems
9b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//kau shi ka lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams
9b6('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs
9b7('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus
10a1('bum): mang du 'grol lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mad//bde bar gshegs pa ma 'o//bamam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka rdong
10a2('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams
10a3('bum): ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/de dag la bslabs
10a4('bum): shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//
10a5('bum): thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//
10a6('bum): thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom po nyid thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par
10a7('bum): gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug
10b1('bum): go/'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon yang rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu'o//mngon par rdzogs par
10b2('bum): 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i
10b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid
10b4('bum): dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
10b5('bum): dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa
10b6('bum): nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
10b7('bum): pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag
11a1('bum): bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
11a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /ting nge 'dzin thams
11a3('bum): cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas
11a4('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dag ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa
11a5('bum): gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shi kra rnam grangs des kyang /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bum du bris shing
11a6('bum): klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha tron du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shI kra ra~M
11a7('bum): ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la so/chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/de dag yod pas/rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod de//bram ze'i rigs
11b1('bum): tshezhing mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim bdag gi rigs tshe zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do//mtsho ma'o//
11b2('bum): lha rnams yod do//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do//'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//
11b3('bum): tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do//snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung snang gi lha rnams yod
11b4('bum): do//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung dge'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams
11b5('bum): yod do//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//tshe ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung che'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi/
11b6('bum): che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//
11b7('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod de//'du
12a1('bum): shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bzod pa'i pha
12a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa yod do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//nang stong pa nyid
12a3('bum): yod do//phyi stong pa nyid yod do//phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//chen po stong pa nyid yod do//don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do//'dus byas stong
12a4('bum): pa nyid yod do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do//
12a5('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid/
12a6('bum): yod do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do//yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do//
12a7('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do//dbang po rnams yod do//stobs rnams yod do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
12b1('bum): yod do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do//bsam gtan rnams yod do//tshad med pa rnams yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do//rnam par
12b2('bum): thar pa brgyad yod do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dbu yod do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yod do//mngon par
12b3('bum): shes pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do//mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do//so so yang
12b4('bum): dag par rig pa rnams yod do//snying rje chen po yod do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
12b5('bum): bu yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//dgra bcom pa nyid yod do//rang byang chub yod do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//rnam pa thams
12b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do//dgra bcom pa rnams yod
12b7('bum): ngongo//rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//
13a1('bum): kau shi ka nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las
13a2('bum): bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du
13a3('bum): sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom
13a4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang /bri ba dang //kha ton
13a5('bum): du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i
13a6('bum): chos rnams rgya cher bstan to/de dag la bslabs shing /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go//'jug par
13a7('bum): 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob
13b1('bum): par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//rang
13b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /byang chub sems dpa'i
13b3('bum): skyon mod par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go//'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par
13b4('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul
13b5('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
13b6('bum): phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
13b7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /
14a1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa/
14a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
14a3('bum): dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang rnam par thar
14a4('bum): pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par
14a5('bum): shes pa drug dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag
14a6('bum): par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dag
14a7('bum): ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad mod pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha
14b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa grogs bam du bros shing klag pa dang /bri ba dang /khwa ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//de
14b2('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//bram
14b3('bum): ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod
14b4('bum): do//mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do//'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs ris kyi lha
14b5('bum): rnams yod do//tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do//snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//
14b6('bum): chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung dge'i lha rnams yod do//
14b7('bum): ched med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//che ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung che'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do//
15a1('bum): 'bras r+b+ba No hrI sgra rnams yod do//mi che ba'o sgra rnams yod do//mi gdung ba'i sgra rnams spyod do//shin tu mthong ba'o//rnams yod do//rgyu nga/
15a2('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//
15a3('bum): cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims kyi pha
15a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa yod do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol
15a5('bum): tu phyin po yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod do//phyi stong pa nyid yod do//phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//chen po stong pa nyid yod do//don dam
15a6('bum): pastong pa nyid yod do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
15a7('bum): yod do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do//mi dmigs pa
15b1('bum): stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do//yang
15b2('bum): dag par spong ba rnams yod do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do//dbang po rnams yod do//stobs rnams yod do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//'phags pa'i
15b3('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do//bsam gtan rnams yod do//tshad med pa rnams yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
15b4('bum): pa rnams yod do//rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /
15b5('bum): smon pa med pa yod do//mngon par shes pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do//
15b6('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do//snying rje chen po yod do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do//rgyun du zhugs
15b7('bum): pa'i 'bras bu yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//dgra bcom pa nyid yod do//rang byang chub yod do//lam gyi rnam
16a1('bum): pa shes pa nyid yod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod de//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//phyir mi 'ong
16a2('bum): ba rnams yod do//dgra bcom pa rnams yod do//rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa
16a3('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//kau shi ka 'og gri phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi
16a4('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la rab
16a5('bum): tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde
16a6('bum): bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo glang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs
16a7('bum): bam klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
16b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/de dag la bslabs shing /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//
16b2('bum): 'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//
16b3('bum): thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur
16b4('bum): ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub
16b5('bum): sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//
16b6('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka zug pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
16b7('bum): pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab
17a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don
17a2('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor
17a3('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po
17a4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu
17a5('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden
17a6('bum): pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang //
17a7('bum): smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs
17b1('bum): pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang //
17b2('bum): btang snyoms chen po dag ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes
17b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes
17b4('bum): par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya che ro bstan te/de dag yod pas/rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba
17b5('bum): rnams yod do//bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim bdog gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa
17b6('bum): gsum gyi lha rnams yod do//mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do//'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod
17b7('bum): do//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do//snang ba'i lha
18a1('bum): rnams yang ngo //rlung snang gi sgra rnams yod do//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//
18a2('bum): chung dge'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//che ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung che'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med che/
18a3('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//gya nom
18a4('bum): snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//
18a5('bum): cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mchod kyi lha rnams yod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims kyi pha
18a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa yod do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu
18a7('bum): phyin pa yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod do//phyi stong pa nyid yod do//phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//chen po stong pa nyid yod do//don dam
18b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid yod do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//mnga' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod
18b2('bum): do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do//mi dmigs pa stong pa
18b3('bum): nyid yod do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do//
18b4('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do//dbang po rnams yod do//stobs rnams yod do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//'phags
18b5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do//bsam gtan rnams yod do//tshad med pa rnams yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
18b6('bum): 'jug pa rnams yod do//rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med
18b7('bum): pa dang /smon pa med pa yod do//mngon par shes pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
19a1('bum): yod do//ma 'jigs pa rnams yod do//so so yad dag/par rig pa rnams yod do//stong rje chen po yod do//sangs rgyab kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nga
19a2('bum): do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mo da//dgra bcom pa nyid yod do//rang byang chub yod
19a3('bum): de//lam myi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod de//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do//lan c-ig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//phyir mi'o
19a4('bum): brnams yod de//dgra bcom pa rnams yod do//rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
19a5('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//kau shi ka steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi
19a6('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/
19a7('bum): kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs
19b1('bum): pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i grogs bam klag pa dang /bri ba dang /
19b2('bum): kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos
19b3('bum): rnams rgya cher bstan te/de dag la bslabs shing /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//rgyun du
19b4('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i
19b5('bum): 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa po rnams kyis rang
19b6('bum): byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//
19b7('bum): 'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par/
20a1('bum): rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka zug pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
20a2('bum): dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong
20a3('bum): pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa
20a4('bum): nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin
20a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa
20a6('bum): nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /
20a7('bum): stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mther
20b1('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /ting nge 'dzin/
20b2('bum): thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi
20b3('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dag ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dog kyang
20b4('bum): rgya cher bstan to//kau shI ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'ami rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton
20b5('bum): du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
20b6('bum): 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/de dag yod pas/rgyal rogs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim bdag
20b7('bum): gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do//mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//dga' ldan gyi
21a1('bum): lha rnams yod do//'dul dgra'i lha rnams yod do//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi sgra rnams yod do//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs
21a2('bum): phan gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do//snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//
21a3('bum): tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung dge'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams
21a4('bum): yod do//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//che ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung che'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod
21a5('bum): do//mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og min gyi lha
21a6('bum): rnams yod do//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams
21a7('bum): yod do//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bzod pa'i
21b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod
21b2('bum): do//phyi stong pa nyid yod do//phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//chen po stong pa nyid yod do//don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do//'dus byas stong pa nyid
21b3('bum): yod do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do//rang bzhin
21b4('bum): stong pa nyid yod do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do//
21b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do//yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
21b6('bum): pa rnams yod do//dbang po rnams yod do//stobs rnams yod do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do//'phags
21b7('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams yod do//bsam gtan rnams yod do//tshad med pa rnams yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do//rnam par thar pa brgyad
22a1('bum): yod do//mthar gyis bla nas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yod do//
22a2('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do//mi 'jigs pa rnams/
22a3('bum): yod do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do//snying rje chen po yod do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do//lan
22a4('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//dgra bcom pa nyid yod do//rang byang chub yod do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//rnam pa
22a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do//dgra bcom pa rnams yod do//rang
22a6('bum): sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//
22a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po brgya so gcig pa//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin
22b1('bum): pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/de'i bsod nams chos mang du 'phel gyi/dza m+bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i/
22b2('bum): las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no//gling
22b3('bum): chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
22b4('bum): 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no//stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /bsam gtan
22b5('bum): bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no//stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring
22b6('bum): po'i sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon
22b7('bum): par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang //bsam gtan bzhi
23a1('bum): dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no//des tshul bzhin du yod
23a2('bum): la byed pa ni 'di yin te/gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /kun chub par byed pa
23a3('bum): dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/bsam gtan gyi pha rol
23a4('bum): tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod
23a5('bum): pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /'tshong ba dang /klog pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//
23a6('bum): gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /'chang po dang /klog
23a7('bum): pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /kun chub
23b1('bum): par byed pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i zlos/sbyin pa'i pha
23b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod
23b3('bum): pa'ang mo yin pa'i blos/nang stong pa nyid 'dzin pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin//
23b4('bum): mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/phyi stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis po la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i zlos/phyi
23b5('bum): nang stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed
23b6('bum): pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/chen po stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi
23b7('bum): gnyis pa la spyod pa'ong ma yin pa'i blos/don dam pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos///
24a1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/'dus ma byas
24a2('bum): stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du
24a3('bum): yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//
24a4('bum): gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis/
24a5('bum): pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod po'ang ma yin pa'i blos/chos
24a6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshul
24a7('bum): bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blo sa/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//
24b1('bum): gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi
24b2('bum): gnyis pa lo spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos//
24b3('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
24b4('bum): rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/yang dag par spong ba rnams tshul bzhin du yid la
24b5('bum): byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod
24b6('bum): po'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/dbang po rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ong ma
24b7('bum): yin pa'i blos/stobs rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ong ma yin pa'i blos/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
25a1('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/'phags pa'i lamA yan lag brgyad pa
25a2('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed
25a3('bum): pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/bsam gtan rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin//
25a4('bum): mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/tshad med pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i
25a5('bum): blos/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/rnam
25a6('bum): par thar pa brgyad tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
25a7('bum): pa dgu tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang mo yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med
25b1('bum): pa dang /smon pa med pa tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/mngon par shes pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid
25b2('bum): la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ting nge 'dzin rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa 'du ma yin//
25b3('bum): mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/gzungs kyi sgo rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos//
25b4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/mi 'jigs pa rnams tshul
25b5('bum): bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis
25b6('bum): la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/snying rje chen po tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang
25b7('bum): ma yin pa'i blos/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/thams
26a1('bum): cad shes pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rdzu/
26a2('bum): bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//
26a3('bum): kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rnam grangs du mar rgya cher rjod cing ston la/'chad cing 'grel
26a4('bum): pa dang /rnam par 'byed cing /gsal bar byed la/yang dag par ston cing /de'i don gtan la dbab par ston par byed na/kau shi ka de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
26a5('bum): don ni 'di yin te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su lta ba ma yin/gnyis su med par lta ba ma yin/mtshon mar ma yin/mtshan ma med par ma yin/blang
26a6('bum): bar ma yin/dor bar ma yin/dbri bar ma yin/bsnun par ma yin/kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin/rnam par byang bar ma yin/skye bar ma yin/'gag par
26a7('bum): ma yin/gzung bar ma yin/mi gzung bar ma yin/len par ma yin/dor bar ma yin/gnas par ma yin/mi gnas par ma yin/yong dag par ma yin//log
26b1('bum): par ma yin/ldan par mA yin/mi ldan par ma yin/'dre bar ma yin/mi dreg ma yin/rkyen du ma yin/rkyen med par ma yin/chos su ma yin/chos ma yin par ma
26b2('bum): yin/de bzhin nyid du ma yin/de bzhin nyid ma yin par ma yin/yang dag pa'i ma/ ma yin/yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par ma yin te/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bum
26b3('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/gzhan la rgya cher rjod cing ston la 'chad cing 'grel pa dang /rnam par 'byed cing /gsal bar bye la yang dag par ston par byed cing /de'i
26b4('bum): don gtan la dbab par ston par byed na/bsod nams mang du 'phel gyi/bdag 'ba' zhig gis gzung ba 'am/kun chub par byas po 'am/bcangs pa 'am/byuklags pa'am
26b5('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byas pas ni ma yin no//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig/bdag nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin cing /kun
26b6('bum): chub par byed de/'chang zhing klog la/tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing de gzhan la'ang rgya cher rjod cing ston la/'chad cing 'grel pa dang /rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed
26b7('bum): la/yang dag par ston par byed cing /de'i don gtan la dbab por ston par byed na/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ni/shin tu mang du 'phel lo//bo rgya
27a1('bum): byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar don dang ldan la/yi ge dang ldan par
27a2('bum): bstan par bgyi'am/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar don dang ldan/yi ge/
27a3('bum): dang ldan par bstan par byas te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ni/bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//kau shi
27a4('bum): ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'omo rigs kyi bu mo la las/shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la/nam
27a5('bum): 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan rnam pa
27a6('bum): sna tshogs dang /bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang /bkur stir byas pa dang /phu dud du byas pa dang /mchod pa byas pa bas/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am
27a7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mor brjod do/bstan pa dang /bshad
27b1('bum): de bkrol zhing /rnam par phye ste gasngal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phrul lo//de ci'i phyir na
27b2('bum): na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
27b3('bum): kyis/bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
27b4('bum): 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa
27b5('bum): dag la/nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /phreng ba dang spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan rnam
27b6('bum): pa sna tshogs dang /bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis/rim gror byas pa dang /bkur stir byas pa dang /phu dud du byas pa dang /mchod pa byas pa bas/kau shi ka rigs
27b7('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/bstan pa dang /bshad
28a1('bum): /da bkrol zhing /rnam par bye ste gas la ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas na/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i banod nams 'di ni rgyas mang du 'phe
28a2('bum): lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
28a3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
28a4('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
28a5('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la/nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dong /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs
28a6('bum): dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs dang /bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim glor byas pa dang /bkur stir byas pa dang /phu dud du byas pa dang /
28a7('bum): mchod pa byas pa bas/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/yi ge dang ldan par rnam
28b1('bum): blangs du mar brjod do/bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing /rnam par bya ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dro'i bsod nams 'di
28b2('bum): ni/ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po 'di la bslabs te/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /de ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
28b3('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon
28b4('bum): par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
28b5('bum): tshad med grangs med pa dag la/nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan
28b6('bum): dang /sel snyan sna tshogs dang /bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis/rim gror byas pa dang /bkur stir byas pa dang /phu dud du byas pa dang /mchod po byas pa bas/kau shi ka
28b7('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/yi ge dang ldan por rnam grangs du mar brjod de/bstan pa dang /
29a1('bum): bshad de bkrol zhing /rnam par phye ste/gsal ba dang yang dag par bstan pa byas na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du
29a2('bum): 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /de ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
29a3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
29a4('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
29a5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la/nam 'tshe'i bar du me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang //
29a6('bum): gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs dang /bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis/rim gror byas pa dang /bkur spyir byas pa dang /phu dud du
29a7('bum): byas pa dang /mchod pa byas pa bas//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/yi ge dang
29b1('bum): ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing /rnam par phye ste/gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas na/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu
29b2('bum): mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/'das pa dang /mo byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de
29b3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/bla na myong pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//
29b4('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'amo rigs kyi bu mo la las/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams
29b5('bum): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la/nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang //
29b6('bum): byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs dang /bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas
29b7('bum): pa dang /bkur stir byas pa dang /phu dud du byas pa dang /mchod pa byas pa bas/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'ami rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
30a1('bum): pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/yi go dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/bstan pa dang /bshang de bkrol shing /rnam par phye stegasal
30a2('bum): ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
30a3('bum): la bslabs te/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/bla na med pa
30a4('bum): yang dgra par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shI ka gal te rigs kyi
30a5('bum): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la/nam
30a6('bum): 'tsho'i bar du me tog drug/phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshon dang /ba dan dang /sil+ya snyanA sna
30a7('bum): tshogs dang /bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis/rim gror byas pa dang /bkur stir byas pa dang /pu dud du byas pa dang /mchod pa byas pa bas/kau shi ka
30b1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgyu cher don dang ldan/yi go dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod do/bstan pa dang //
30b2('bum): bshad de bkrol zhing /rnam par phye skye gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni chos mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i
30b3('bum): phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
30b4('bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
30b5('bum): rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/nub byung gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
30b6('bum): rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la/nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /phreng ba dang spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /
30b7('bum): ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs dang /bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang /bkur stir byis pa dang /phu dud du byas pa dang /mchod pa byas pa bas
31a1('bum): kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs
31a2('bum): du mar brjod de/bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol shing /rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang yang dag par bstan pa byas na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di
31a3('bum): ni ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/'das pa dang mi byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
31a4('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par
31a5('bum): 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
31a6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la/nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza'
31a7('bum): dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs dang /bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang /bkur stor byas pa dang /phu
31b1('bum): dung du byas pa dang /mchod pa byas pa bas/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/yi ge dang
31b2('bum): ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i
31b3('bum): bsod nams 'di ni chos mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs
31b4('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs
31b5('bum): par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'ching rgya bar 'gyur ro//ko shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
31b6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la/nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang //
31b7('bum): gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs dang /bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang /bkur stir byas pa dang /phu dud du byas
32a1('bum): pa dang mchod pa byas pa bas/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/yi ge
32a2('bum): dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing /rnam par phye ste/gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas na/rigs kyi bu 'am
32a3('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da
32a4('bum): ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
32a5('bum): sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la
32a6('bum): las bskal pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /bskal pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis//
32a7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /bskal pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /bskal pa
32b1('bum): tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /bskal pa tshad med grangs mod par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/bsam
32b2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /bskal pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa bas ni/gang la las shes rab kyi pha
32b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/yi ge dang ldan par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/gzhan la rgya cher brjod cing /ston la 'chad cing /rnam par 'god pa dang /rab tu 'god cing //
32b4('bum): rnam par 'byed la/gsal bar byed cing /yang dag par ston pa byed na/de'i bsod nams ches memang du 'phel lo//de la dmigs pa ni 'di yin te/kau shi ka 'di la byang chub
32b5('bum): sems dpa' dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa gtong zhing 'di snyam du bdag ni sbyin pa gtong ngo //sbyin pa ni 'di gtong ngo //'di la ni sbyin pa bya'o snyam na/des sbyin pa de ltar btang bas/
32b6('bum): sbyin pa nyid du 'gyur gyi/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/tshul khrims srung zhing 'di snyam du bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo //tshul khrims ni 'di
32b7('bum): srong ngo snyam ni/des tshul khrims de ltar bsrungs pas/tshul khrims nyid du 'gyur gyi/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa bsgom
33a1('bum): zhing 'di snyam du bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo//bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo snyam na/des bzod pa de ltar bsgoms pas/bzod pa nyid du 'gyur gyi/bzod pa'i pha
33a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/brtson 'grus rtsom zhing 'di snyam du bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo//'di'i don du brtson 'grus brtsam mo snyam na/
33a3('bum): des brtson 'grus de ltar brtsams pas/brtson 'grus nyid du 'gyur gyi/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/bsam gtan rnams
33a4('bum): la snyoms par 'jug cing 'di snyam du bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug go/bsam gtan ni 'di dag la mnyam par bzhag go snyam na/des bsam gtan la de
33a5('bum): ltar mnyam par bzhag pas bsam gtan nyid du 'gyur gyi/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/shes rab sgom zhing 'di snyam du bdag
33a6('bum): ni shes rab sgom mo//shes rab ni 'di sgom mo snyam na/des shes rab de ltar bsgoms pas/shes rab nyid du 'gyur gyi/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//kau
33a7('bum): shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ltar dmigs pa la spyod pas ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
33b1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro//
33b2('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom
33b3('bum): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
33b4('bum): pos ji ltar spyad na/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
33b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyod na/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/byang chubo sems
33b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/
33b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi kau 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smyon pa
34a1('bum): gtong ba'i tshe/yongs su gtong ba mi dmigs/sbyin pa dang /len pa mi dmigs so//tshul khrims srung ba'i tshe/tshul khrims dang /tshul khrims yang dag
34a2('bum): par blang ba mi dmigs so//bzod pa sgom pa'i tshe/bzod pa dang /bzod pa sgom pa mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe/brtson 'grus dang /brtson 'grus rtsom
34a3('bum): pa mi dmigs so//bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe/bsam gtan dang /bsam gtan sgom pa mi dmigs so//shes rab sgom pa'i tshe/shes rab dang /
