64a5('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal
64a6('bum): ldo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
64a7('bum): phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//dbang po rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/dbang po rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/dbang po rnams bdag med do
64b1('bum): zhes bya bar ston/dbang po rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/su la bstan pa de dag kyang /dbang
64b2('bum): po rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//dbang po rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//dbang po rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//dbang po rnams mi sdug
64b3('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag dbang po rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /dbang po rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /dbang po rnams bdag med do/
64b4('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /dbang po rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//stobs rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar
64b5('bum): ston/stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/stobs rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/stobs rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/
64b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/su la bstan pa de dag kyang /stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par
64b7('bum): 'gyur ro//stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//stobs rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag stobs rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa
65a1('bum): dang /stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /stobs rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /stobs rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas//
65a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya
65a3('bum): pabar ston/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/shes rab kyi
65a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/su la bstan pa de dag kyang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal
65a5('bum): zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de
65a6('bum): ltar de dag byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag
65a7('bum): med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i
65b1('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtog go zhes bya bar ston/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med do zhes bya bar
65b2('bum): ston/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/su la bstan pa de dag
65b3('bum): kyang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i lam
65b4('bum): yan lag brgyad pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
65b5('bum): brgyad pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med do zhes bya bar
65b6('bum): rtog pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
65b7('bum): mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi
66a1('bum): /sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/sul bstan pa de dag kyang /'phags pa'i
66a2('bum): bden pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag med ces bya
66a3('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
66a4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya
66a5('bum): bar rtog pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//bsam gtan rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya
66a6('bum): bar ston/bsam gtan rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/bsam gtan rnams mi sprug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'ad skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
66a7('bum): la spyod do zhes brjod de/su la bstan pa de dag kyang /bsam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//
66b1('bum): bsam gtan rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//bsam gtan rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag bsam gtan rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog/
66b2('bum): pa dang /bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /bsam gtan rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /bsam gtan rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/
66b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//tshad med pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/tshad med pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/tshad med pa rnams
66b4('bum): bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/tshad med pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/su la bstan
66b5('bum): pa de dag kyang /tshad med pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//tshad med pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//tshad med pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog
66b6('bum): par 'gyur ro//tshad med pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag tshad med pa rnams mi rtog go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /tshad med pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya
66b7('bum): par rtog pa dang /tshad med pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /tshad med pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par
67a1('bum): 'gyur ro//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar
67a2('bum): ston/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de
67a3('bum): ltar spyod pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/su la bstan pa de dag kyang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
67a4('bum): ro//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
67a5('bum): ro//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog
67a6('bum): pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
67a7('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa rnams mi
67b1('bum): rtag go zhes bya bar ston/rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/rnam par thar pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/rnam par thar pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar
67b2('bum): ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/su la bstan pa de dag kyang /rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
67b3('bum): ro//rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar
67b4('bum): rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /rnam par thar pa rnams bdag
67b5('bum): med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//mthar gyis gnas
67b6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
67b7('bum): rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
68a1('bum): la spyod do zhes brjod do/su la bstan pa de dag kyang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//mthar gyis gnas
68a2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//
68a3('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar
68a4('bum): rtog pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar
68a5('bum): rtog pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//rnam par
68a6('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa sdug bsngal lo/
68a7('bum): zhes bya bar ston/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa
68b1('bum): dang /smon pa med pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/su la bstan pa de dag kyang /rnam par thar pa'i
68b2('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smyon pa med pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan mi med pa dang /smon pa med pa sdug bsngal zhes bya
68b3('bum): par rtog par 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
68b4('bum): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mi rtag go zhes bya
68b5('bum): bar rtog pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa
68b6('bum): dang smon pa med pa bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
68b7('bum): pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/mngon par shes pa rnams
69a1('bum): bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/mngon par shes pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'di sbyang du ga dang ltar spyod pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/
69a2('bum): zhes brjod de/su la bstan pa de dag kyang /mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//
69a3('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag mngon par shes pa rnams mi
69a4('bum): rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /mngon par shes pa
69a5('bum): rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ting nge 'dzin
69a6('bum): rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ting nge 'dzin rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni//
69a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/su la bstan pa de dag kyang /ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal zhes
69b1('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag mod ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag ting nge 'dzin rnams
69b2('bum): mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams mi sdug go/
69b3('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes
69b4('bum): bya bar ston/gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
69b5('bum): lo spyod do zhes brjod de/su la bstan pa de dag kyang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//
69b6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag go zhes bya
69b7('bum): bar rtog pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar
70a1('bum): rtog pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/de bzhin gshegs
70a2('bum): pa'i stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam sna bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi sdug go zhes bya
70a3('bum): bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/su la bstan pa de dag kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi rtag ces
70a4('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par
70a5('bum): 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
70a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
70a7('bum): stobs rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/mi
70b1('bum): 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar skyon/mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag med de zhes bya bar ston/mi 'jigs pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/
70b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/su la bstan pa de dag kyang /mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
70b3('bum): rtog par 'gyur ro//mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//mi 'jigs pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag
70b4('bum): go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog
70b5('bum): pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po brgya so gsum pa//so so yang dag par
70b6('bum): rig pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/so so yang dag par dge pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/so so yang dag par rig
70b7('bum): pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/su la bstan pa de dag kyang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
71a1('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//sa sa yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag med
71a2('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog
71a3('bum): pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
71a4('bum): mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//snying rje chen po mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/snying rje chen po sdug bsngal lo zhes
71a5('bum): bya bar ston/snying rje chen po bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/snying rje chen po mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do
71a6('bum): zhes brjod de/su la bstan pa de dag kyang /snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//snying rje chen po bodag
71a7('bum): med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//snying rje chen po mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag snying rje chen po mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /snying rje chen po sdug bsngal
71b1('bum): lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /snying rje chen po bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /snying rje chen po mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur
71b2('bum): ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag med
71b3('bum): do zhes bya bar ston/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/su la
71b4('bum): bstan pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas
71b5('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
71b6('bum): 'dres pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar
71b7('bum): rtog pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la skyed par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi
72a1('bum): rtag go zhes bya bar ston/rgyun du zhugs pa'o 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/rgyun du na
72a2('bum): pa'i 'bras bu mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/su la bstan pa de dag kyang /rgyun du zhugs
72a3('bum): pa'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bdag med ces bya bar
72a4('bum): rtog par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /rgyun du zhugs
72a5('bum): pa'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/
72a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo/
72a7('bum): zhes bya bar ston/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa
72b1('bum): no/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do nas brjod do/sul bstan pa d+mo dag kyang /lan cog phyir 'ang ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bang rtog par 'gyur ro//ldan cig phyir 'ong bar
72b2('bum): 'bras bu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi sdug ces bya bar rtog
72b3('bum): par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /lon cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /lhan cig phyir
72b4('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur
72b5('bum): ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/phyir mi
72b6('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/su la bstan pa de dag kyang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
72b7('bum): bu mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//
73a1('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
73a2('bum): bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi ldog go zhes bya bar rtog pas/shes rab kyi
73a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/dgra bcom pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/dgra bcom pa
73a4('bum): nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/dgra bcom pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod do/su
73a5('bum): la bstan pa de dag kyang /dgra bcom pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid bdag med
73a6('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid mi ldog ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag dgra bcom pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid
73a7('bum): sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
73b1('bum): gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//rang byang chub mi rtag ga nas bya bar ston/rang byang chub sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/rang byang chub bdag med de nas bya bar ston/rang byu
73b2('bum): chub ma sdug go zhes bya bar snyan cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pon/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/sul bstan pa de dag kyang /rang byang chub mi rtagacos
73b3('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//rang byang chub sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//rang byang chub bdag mod ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//rang byang chub mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par
73b4('bum): 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag rang byang chub mi rnyog go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /rang byang chub sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog po dang /rang byang chub bdag med do zhes bya bar rtag pa dang rang byang chub ma
73b5('bum): sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
73b6('bum): sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag med de zhes bya bar ston/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/shes
73b7('bum): ri kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de zhes brjod de/su la bstan pa de dag kyang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya
74a1('bum): bar rtog par 'gyur ro//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//
74a2('bum): de ltar de dag lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /lam gyi rnam po shes pa nyid bdag med
74a3('bum): do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
74a4('bum): nyid mi rtog go zhes bya bar ston/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stan/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar ston//rnam pa thams cad
74a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/su la bstan pa de dag kyang /rnam pa thams cad
74a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag med ces
74a7('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
74b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog
74b2('bum): pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur te/kau shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs
74b3('bum): kyekyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston na 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang /byang chub
74b4('bum): sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang /sa gsum pa dang /sa bzhi pa dang /sa lnga pa dang /sa drug pa dang /sa bdun pa dang /sa brgyad
74b5('bum): pa dang /sa dgu pa dang /sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro//tshur rigs kyi bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/khyod kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang /
74b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang /sa gsum pa dang /sra bzhi pa dang /sa lnga pa dang /sa drug pa dang /sa bdun pa
74b7('bum): dang /sa brgyad pa dang /sa dgu pa dang /sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro//tshur rigs kyi bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/khyod kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
75a1('bum): pa ba rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang /sagasam pa dang /sraban pa dang /sak+Sha/
75a2('bum): dang /sa drug pa dang /sa bdun pa dang /sa brgyad pa dang /sa dgu pa dang /sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro//tshur rigs kyi bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/khyod kyis
75a3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang /sa gsum pa dang /sa bzhi pa dang /
75a4('bum): sa lnga pa dang /sa drug pa dang /sa bdun pa dang /sa brgyad pa dang /sa dgu pa dang /sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro//tshur rigs kyi bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms
75a5('bum): shig khyod kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang /sa gsum pa dang /
75a6('bum): sa bzhi pa dang /sA lnga pa dang /sa drug pa dang /sa bdun pa dang /sa brgyad pa dang /sa dgu pa dang /sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro//tshur rigs kyi bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
75a7('bum): sgoms shig khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang /sa gsum pa dang /
75b1('bum): sa bzhi pa dang /sa lnga pa dang /sa drug pa dang /sa bdun pa dang /sa brgyad pa dang /sa dgu pa dang /sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro//zhes de'ang mtshan ma'i tshul dang /dmigs/
75b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ston te/de'i dus kyi 'du shes kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par 'gyur te/kau shI ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no//kau shi ka
75b3('bum): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/
75b4('bum): chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang /nyan thos kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro rang sangs
75b5('bum): rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//zhes ston te/kau shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang
75b6('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston na/'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
75b7('bum): phyin pa sgoms shig/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro//mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par
76a1('bum): 'gyur ro//khyod kyis de ltar mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa la gnas te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
76a2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phru dud dang /ma chod pa byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes/rigs kyi bu
76a3('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ston na 'di skad ston te/rigs kyi bu dag su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin
76a4('bum): cing /'chang ba dang /klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni/bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med par 'gyur ro zhes zer te/rigs kyi
76a5('bum): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ston nA/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i
76a6('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
76a7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi/dge ba'i
76b1('bum): rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/rjes su dga' bar gyis la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig ces rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
76b2('bum): bu mo de dag la de ltar ston cing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar ston na/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu
76b3('bum): mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
76b4('bum): stsal pa/kau shi ka 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te//
76b5('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis
76b6('bum): stong ste/gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/
76b7('bum): gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la gzugs nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga lo yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu
77a1('bum): 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dang ba na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau sha ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo dag byang chub
77a2('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms
77a3('bum): shig/tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa'o//
77a4('bum): dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de
77a5('bum): la tshor ba nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
77a6('bum): gzugs brtan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shos rab kyi
77a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci
77b1('bum): byu non/'du shes na rang bzhin gyis stong ste/'du shes kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa don/dngan pa med na'o/dam pa med pa gang min pa den/shes rabagyi pa rol tu phyin pa ste/shes pa
77b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/'du shes rtag ces bya ba'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la 'du shes nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston
77b3('bum): te/kau sho ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo
77b4('bum): ded//byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar skyon te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
77b5('bum): phyin pa sgoms shig/'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'du byed ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/'du byed kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos
77b6('bum): po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi
77b7('bum): dmigs so//de la 'du byed nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lhag la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi
78a1('bum): rob tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan snang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi
78a2('bum): bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bri khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag
78a3('bum): par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang
78a4('bum): yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de
78a5('bum): la rnam par shes pa nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
78a6('bum): phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/
78a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/mig mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de
78b1('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/mig ni rang bzhin gyis skyong ste/mig gi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes
78b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/mig rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la mig nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/
78b3('bum): shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
78b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
78b5('bum): sgoms shig/rna ba mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rna ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/rna ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa'o///
78b6('bum): dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rna ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la
78b7('bum): rna ba nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am/mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
79a1('bum): gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de
79a2('bum): dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/sna mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lha
79a3('bum): zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/sna ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/sna'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
79a4('bum): pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni sna rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la sna nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta go la
79a5('bum): yod ces ston te/kau shi kA de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang
79a6('bum): rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur
79a7('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/lce mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/lce ni rang bzhin gyis
79b1('bum): stong ste/lce'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni//
79b2('bum): lce rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la lce nyid kyang med na/rtug pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/
79b3('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
79b4('bum): rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/lus mi rtag ces
79b5('bum): bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/lus ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/lus kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa
79b6('bum): de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/lus rtag ces bya ba 'am/me rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la lus nyid kyang med na//
79b7('bum): rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lha go la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de lhor ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi
80a1('bum): ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
80a2('bum): ltar ston te/chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/yid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/yid ni rang
80a3('bum): bzhin gyis stong ste/yid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de la ni/dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
80a4('bum): gang yin pa de la ni/yid rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la yid nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston
80a5('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag/byang chub
80a6('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms
80a7('bum): shig/gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/dngos
80b1('bum): pa med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba
80b2('bum): mi dmigs so//de la gzugs nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha
80b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la
80b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar skyon te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/sgra mi rtag zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe
80b5('bum): na/sgra ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/sgra'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
80b6('bum): glagrang yin pa de la ni/sgra rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la sgra nyid kyang med na/rtag pa'am/mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston to/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i
80b7('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang //rigs kyi bu mo de dag/byang chub sems
81a1('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
81a2('bum): sgoms shig/dri mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/dri ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/dri'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa'o//
81a3('bum): dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/dri rtag ces bya ba'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la dri///
81a4('bum): nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am/mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
81a5('bum): brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha
81a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ro mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe
81a7('bum): na/ro ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ro'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol
81b1('bum): tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ro nAg ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la ro nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston to/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i
81b2('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems
81b3('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms
81b4('bum): shig/reg mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/regro ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/reg gi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa'o//dngos
81b5('bum): po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/reg rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la
81b6('bum): reg nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am/mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
81b7('bum): gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shes rab
82a1('bum): ldan phyin \u0f7f/na rdzogs rgyu /shes rab la tu sbyin pa rnams //chos mi rtag nas bya bar yang dag par rjes sum na/
82a2('bum): deci'i phyir zhe na/chos ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/chos kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med po'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/
82a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/chos rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la chos nyid kyang med na/rtag pa'am/mi rtag pa lca ga la yod
82a4('bum): ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bung
82a5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/
82a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/mig gi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin
82a7('bum): gyis stong ste/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha
82b1('bum): tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/mig gi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang med na/rtag pa'am/mi rtag
82b2('bum): pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs
82b3('bum): kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu
82b4('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rang
82b5('bum): bzhin gyis stong ste/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
82b6('bum): byiphyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta gA la
82b7('bum): yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu
83a1('bum): drang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/chur rigs
83a2('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/sna'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/sna'i rnam par shes
83a3('bum): pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes
83a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/sna'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am/mi rtag
83a5('bum): pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan
83a6('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs
83a7('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/lce'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/lce'i rnam par shes pa
83b1('bum): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha
83b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/lce'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang med na/rtag pa'am/mi rtag
83b3('bum): pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang
83b4('bum): rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs
83b5('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/lus kyi rnam par
83b6('bum): shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
83b7('bum): phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/lus kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la lus kyi rnam par
84a1('bum): shes pa nyid kyang meng na/rtag pa'am mi rtog pa lha ga la yod ces ston to/kau shA ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab tu/
84a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi
84a3('bum): bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces
84a4('bum): bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/yod kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/dngos
84a5('bum): po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba
84a6('bum): 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myed na/rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lca ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs
84a7('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i
84b1('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/mig gi 'dus te/
84b2('bum): reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de
84b3('bum): ni/dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/mig gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces
84b4('bum): bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
84b5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
84b6('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/rna ba'i
84b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang
85a1('bum): yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa/
85a2('bum): rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi/
85a3('bum): bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
85a4('bum): pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/sna'i 'dus te/
85a5('bum): reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po
85a6('bum): med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/sna'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces
85a7('bum): bya ba mi dmigs so//de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang med na/rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes
85b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la
85b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i
85b3('bum): phyir zhe na/lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
85b4('bum): pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/lce'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang med na/rtag pa'am mi
85b5('bum): rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs
85b6('bum): kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston to/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes
85b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/lus
86a1('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
86a2('bum): pa gang yin pa de la ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la
86a3('bum): yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi
86a4('bum): bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod
86a5('bum): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni
86a6('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ste/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
86a7('bum): phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod/
86b1('bum): ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu myo de
86b2('bum): dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/
86b3('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/mig gi
86b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni//
86b5('bum): myimig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am ma rtag pa lta ga la yod ces
86b6('bum): ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo
86b7('bum): de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
87a1('bum): phyin pa sgoms shig/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
87a2('bum): gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol
87a3('bum): tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la rna ba'i 'dus te
87a4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang med na/rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
87a5('bum): phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi
87a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su
87a7('bum): ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//
87b1('bum): dngos pa med pa gang yin pa don/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/sna'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am mi ga ces bya ba mi dmigs so//
87b2('bum): del sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar smyon pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
87b3('bum): pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
87b4('bum): ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir
87b5('bum): zhe na/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de
87b6('bum): ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la lce'i
87b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
88a1('bum): pa'i gzugs brnyan ma ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la
88a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar yang
88a3('bum): dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis skyong ste/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang
88a4('bum): yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
88a5('bum): tshor brtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lhag la yod ces ston te/
88a6('bum): kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shri ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
88a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston to/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
88b1('bum): sgoms shig/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis
88b2('bum): stong ste/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol
88b3('bum): tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang med na
88b4('bum): rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to///
88b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po brgya so bzhi pa//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
88b6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/sa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su
88b7('bum): ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/sa'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/
89a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni sa'i khams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la sa'i khams nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la
89a2('bum): yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
89a3('bum): mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
89a4('bum): sgoms shig/chu'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/chu'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/
89a5('bum): dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni chu'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya
89a6('bum): ba mi dmigs so//de la chu'i khams nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
89a7('bum): phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
89b1('bum): byiphyin pa 'di ltar ston te/chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/me'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/me'i
89b2('bum): khams ni rang bzhin gyis sbyong ste/me'i khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
89b3('bum): gang yin pa de la ni/me'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la me'i khams nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltur
89b4('bum): ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg/
89b5('bum): pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/rlung gi khams mi rtag ces
89b6('bum): bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rlung gi khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes
89b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/rlung gi khams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la rlung gi khams nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am
90a1('bum): mi rtag pa lca ga la yod nas ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mod dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston te/
90a2('bum): kAgazhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/chur rigs kyi bu khyod/
90a3('bum): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/namam pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya ba yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/nom mkha'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/
90a4('bum): namam pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de lwa na/rnam
90a5('bum): mkha'i khams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya mi dmigs so//de la nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang med na/rtag pa'am mi rtog pa lcag la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs
90a6('bum): bla'am rigs kyi bu ma de dog ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
90a7('bum): kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu me de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams shig/rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces
90b1('bum): bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis spyod ste/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa/
90b2('bum): dngos po med pa gang yin pa do ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmyigs
90b3('bum): so//de la rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang med na/rtog pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
90b4('bum): phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi storan to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
90b5('bum): phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa snyoms shig/mi dag pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/ma rig pa ni rang
90b6('bum): bzhin gyis stong ste/ma rig pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po ming po'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de
90b7('bum): la mi ma rig pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la ma rig pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga yo yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs
91a1('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i thog/
91a2('bum): pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/'du byed mi rtag
91a3('bum): ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'du byed ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/'du byed kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin
91a4('bum): pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la 'du byed nyid kyang
91a5('bum): med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka
91a6('bum): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu
91a7('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/
91b1('bum): rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/rnam par
91b2('bum): shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la rnam par shes pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
91b3('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang
91b4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ming dang gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar yang
91b5('bum): dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/ming dang gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de
91b6('bum): ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ming dang gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la ming dang gzugs nyid
91b7('bum): kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi
92a1('bum): ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
92a2('bum): 'di ltar sngon te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/skye mched drug mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/skye mched drug ni
92a3('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ste/skye mched drug gi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
92a4('bum): gang yin pa de la ni skye mched drug rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la skye mched drug nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar
92a5('bum): ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
92a6('bum): pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang
92a7('bum): dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi
92b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la reg pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces
92b2('bum): ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang
92b3('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig tshor
92b4('bum): ba mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang
92b5('bum): yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la tshor ba nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am
92b6('bum): mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi
92b7('bum): bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol
93a1('bum): tu phyin pa sgoms shig/sred pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/sred pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/sred pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni
93a2('bum): dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/sred pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//
