93a3('bum): de la sred pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston
93a4('bum): to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/chur rigs
93a5('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/len pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/len pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/len pa'i rang
93a6('bum): bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni len pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi/
93a7('bum): rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la len pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi
93b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi
93b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/srid pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/srid
93b3('bum): pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/srid pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
93b4('bum): pa gang yin pa de la ni srid pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la srid pa nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston
93b5('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
93b6('bum): pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/skye ba mi rtag ces bya bar
93b7('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/skye ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/skye ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha
94a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa la ni skye brtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la skye ba nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am/mi rtag pa
94a2('bum): lha ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rig pa
94a3('bum): kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
94a4('bum): snyoms shig/rga shi mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rga shi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/rga shi'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//
94a5('bum): dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rga shi rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la rga shi nyid kyang med na
94a6('bum): rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shau ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi kA gzhan
94a7('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes
94b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong
94b2('bum): ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de
94b3('bum): lo ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/
94b4('bum): kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub
94b5('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/tshul
94b6('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
94b7('bum): phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/tshul khrims
95a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces
95a2('bum): ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
95a3('bum): de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
95a4('bum): sgoms shig/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/bzod pa'i pha
95a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/bzod
95a6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de
95a7('bum): ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'ami rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems
95b1('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/brtson 'grus
95b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang
95b3('bum): bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
95b4('bum): tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shr-i ka de ltar sngon
95b5('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'amo rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mo ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
95b6('bum): pApra pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
95b7('bum): phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa
96a1('bum): de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
96a2('bum): phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston
96a3('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
96a4('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shog/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
96a5('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de
96a6('bum): ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag
96a7('bum): ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang med na/rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de
96b1('bum): dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
96b2('bum): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de
96b3('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/
96b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la nang stong pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces
96b5('bum): ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
96b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/
96b7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/phyi stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//
97a1('bum): dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni phyi stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi
97a2('bum): dmigs so//de la phyi stong pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lha ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha
97a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes
97a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/phyi nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/
97a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha
97a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de lo ni/phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang med
97a7('bum): na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau/
97b1('bum): shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i thog pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu
97b2('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong
97b3('bum): ste/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni stong
97b4('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i
97b5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
97b6('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/chen po stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya
97b7('bum): bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/chen po stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang
98a1('bum): yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/chen po stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//
98a2('bum): de la chen po stong pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
98a3('bum): brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar
98a4('bum): ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/don dam pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/don dam pa
98a5('bum): stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi
98a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod
98a7('bum): ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
98b1('bum): de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms
98b2('bum): shig/'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'dus byas stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
98b3('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba
98b4('bum): 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes
98b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab
98b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de
98b7('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab
99a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la 'dus ma
99a2('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
99a3('bum): brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
99a4('bum): ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe
99a5('bum): na/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes
99a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la mtha' las
99a7('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lto ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
99b1('bum): brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston
99b2('bum): te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/thog
99b3('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol
99b4('bum): tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
99b5('bum): nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//
99b6('bum): kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs
99b7('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni rang
100a1('bum): bzhin gyis snong ste/dong ba med pa stong pa khyod kyi dang bzhin gang yin pa de na dngos pa myed pa'o//dngos po meng pa gang yon pa don sho ba rab rgya pha la tu byon pasgo/shes pa
100a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni do ba med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am mi nAg ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la dong ba med pa stong pa nyid byung med na rtag pa'om mi rtag pa sdug la
100a3('bum): ces sto/kau shika ng+gem+b+ha N+Din ga skye gas kyibu ma de dag ni shes sto sa sbyin pa gzugs pa ta me sbyin/ gzhan pa ga
100a4('bum): mo dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms
100a5('bum): shig/rlung bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang
100a6('bum): sbyin pa de ni ngam pan pa'o//dngam pa med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ma rol tu sbyin pa ste/shes rab la du sbyin pa gang yi na par man/rlung bzhin spyod pyid rtag ces bya
100a7('bum): mirtag ces bye ba mi migs so//de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang med rtag pa'am mi rtog pa stug la yod ces ston te/kau sha~M ka de ltar stod pa'i rigs kyi bu ma rigs kyi bu mi de dag ni shes
100b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab
100b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/
100b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni
100b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la chos thams cad
100b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//
100b6('bum): kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs
100b7('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
101a1('bum): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
101a2('bum): ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang med na rtag
101a3('bum): pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan
101a4('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
101a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis
101a6('bum): stong ste/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
101a7('bum): yin pa de la ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/
101b1('bum): kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems
101b2('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/dngos po med
101b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni
101b4('bum): dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya
101b5('bum): ba mi dmigs so//de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha
101b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha
101b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe
102a1('bum): na/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha
102a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang med na rtag
102a3('bum): pa'am mi rtag pa lta gral yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shri ka gzhan
102a4('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod
102a5('bum): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
102a6('bum): pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis sbyong ste/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/
102a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
102b1('bum): bya nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//
102b2('bum): kau shrI ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dgra la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/chur rigs kyi bu
102b3('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni rang bzhin
102b4('bum): gyis stong ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
102b5('bum): yin pa de la ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau
102b6('bum): shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kr-i shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang
102b7('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/yang
103a1('bum): dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/yang dag par spong ba rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/yang dag par spong ba
103a2('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni yang dag par spong ba
103a3('bum): rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la yang dag par stong pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu
103a4('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu
103a5('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar
103a6('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos
103a7('bum): po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la
103b1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi
103b2('bum): ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur
103b3('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/dbang po rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/dbang po rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong
103b4('bum): ste/dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni dbang
103b5('bum): po rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la dbang po nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te//kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
103b6('bum): bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
103b7('bum): mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta
104a1('bum): zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stobs rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes/
104a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la stobs nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi
104a3('bum): rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs
104a4('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi
104a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong
104a6('bum): ste/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rong bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin/
104a7('bum): pa de la ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang med no/rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/
104b1('bum): kau shika de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub
104b2('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar skyon te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/'gags
104b3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/'phags pa'i
104b4('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni
104b5('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'amo mi rtag pa lta ga la yod
104b6('bum): ces ston te/kau shi/de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
104b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/phags
105a1('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/'phags pa'i bden pa
105a2('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
105a3('bum): rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am
105a4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
105a5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/bsam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag
105a6('bum): par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/bsam gtan rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang
105a7('bum): yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la bsam gtan
105b1('bum): nyid kyang me na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lha ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka
105b2('bum): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
105b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/tshad med pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshad med pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/tshad med pa
105b4('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni tshad med pa rnams rtag ces
105b5('bum): bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la tshad med pa nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes
105b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes
105b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag
106a1('bum): par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
106a2('bum): kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
106a3('bum): 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka
106a4('bum): de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems
106a5('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/rnam par
106a6('bum): thar pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rnam par thar pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de
106a7('bum): ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rnam par thar pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag
106b1('bum): ces bya ba mo migs so//de la rnam par bang ba nyid kyang mngon rtag pa 'am mo rtag pa lcag la yod ces ston te/kau shika de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
106b2('bum): byin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi sbyin to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mod dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
106b3('bum): ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de
106b4('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o///
106b5('bum): dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag
106b6('bum): ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang mdan rtag pa'am mi rtag pa ltag la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka da ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
106b7('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston te//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po brgya so lnga pa//kau shi ka
107a1('bum): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs
107a2('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i
107a3('bum): phyir zhe na/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin
107a4('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
107a5('bum): ma med pa dang smon pa med pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi
107a6('bum): rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu
107a7('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
107b1('bum): phyin pa sgoms shig/mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/mngon par shes pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/mngon par
107b2('bum): shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni mngon par shes
107b3('bum): pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la mngon par shes pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
107b4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs
107b5('bum): kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su
107b6('bum): ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/ting nge 'dzin rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi
107b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang med na rtag
108a1('bum): pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces spyanaH/kau shi ka de ltar stan pa'i rigs kyi glu ma rigs kyi brim+b+ha de dag no shes bkyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mo ston to//
108a2('bum): kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston to//
108a3('bum): chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzungs kyi sgo rnams
108a4('bum): ni rang bzhin gyis spong ste/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
108a5('bum): phyin pa gang yin pa de la na gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mo rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston
108a6('bum): te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston te//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang
108a7('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms
108b1('bum): shig/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/de bzhin
108b2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de
108b3('bum): la ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces
108b4('bum): ston te/kau shi ka de ltar smyon pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
108b5('bum): de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
108b6('bum): sgoms shig/mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/mi 'jigs pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi
108b7('bum): rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni mi 'jigs pa rnams rtag/
109a1('bum): /chos bya ba 'am mi d+hAg tses bya ba myed mgasas//dal ma 'jogs paspyod kyang mngon rtag pa 'am ma rtag pa lta gas ma \u0f7f /kau sho/do na ma tu/
109a2('bum): bru'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i
109a3('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mod dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lta sbyin te/chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/so so yang dag
109a4('bum): par rig pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par d+his su ma lta zhig/de ni'i phyir zhe na/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis steng ste/so so yang dag par rig pa
109a5('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/sa so
109a6('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/
109a7('bum): shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
109b1('bum): bya chub sems pa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu myong dag la shes rab kyi pa ral tu phyin pa 'di ltar skyon te/chur rigs kyi bu khyad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin snyoms shig
109b2('bum): snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/snying rje chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos
109b3('bum): po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni snying rje chen po rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la snying
109b4('bum): rje chen po nyid kyang medan rtag pa'am mi rtag pa ldog la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi
109b5('bum): ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/
109b6('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs
109b7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab
110a1('bum): ci rom tu phyinapa/shes rab rol tu phyin pa gang yon pa de la nas sta nas kyi chos ma 'as rnams rtag cos byu sa tag sa byu ba me gas rga dang/
110a2('bum): lasangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid me na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lkog la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag ni shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
110a3('bum): pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi zla dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mde dag la shes rab gyi
110a4('bum): byin pa 'di ltar ston te/chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci
110a5('bum): phyir zhe na/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes
110a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'brus bu rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i
110a7('bum): 'bras bu nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan
110b1('bum): mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/
110b2('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/lan cig phyir
110b3('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
110b4('bum): ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid
110b5('bum): kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//
110b6('bum): kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs
110b7('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
111a1('bum): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes
111a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga
111a3('bum): la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang
111a4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
111a5('bum): phyin pa sgoms shig/dgra bcom pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/dgra bcom pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
111a6('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni dgra bcom pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/
111a7('bum): mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la dgra bcom pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau sha~M ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes
111b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes
111b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/rang byang chub mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir/
111b3('bum): zhe na/rang byang chub ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab
111b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rang byang chub rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la rang byang chub nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/
111b5('bum): kokau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brtan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang
111b6('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/
111b7('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/lam gyi rnam po shes pa nyid kyi rang
112a1('bum): bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/lam
112a2('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lcag la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston
112a3('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i
112a4('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/rnam pa thams
112a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
112a6('bum): rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
112a7('bum): nyid rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lkog la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i
112b1('bum): rlags kyi pu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shrI ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dang ba byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i/
112b2('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar skyon te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/chos gang las kyang yongs su
112b3('bum): 'da' bar ma byed cig/chos gang la'ang gnas par ma byed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos gang las 'da' bar bya ba 'am gang la gnas par bya ba'i
112b4('bum): chos de la med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes
112b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/blang bar bya ba 'am dor bar bya ba 'am/bskyed par bya ba'am dgag par bya ba'i chos gang yang med do zhes
112b6('bum): spyon te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mo ston to//kau shI kA de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos
112b7('bum): de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bstan par bya ste/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ni ches mang du 'phel gyi/rigs kyi bu 'am
113a1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo snga myu dag gi nA ma yin no//kau shi ka gzhan yang dzam+b+ha gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rgyun du zhugs
113a2('bum): pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //
113a3('bum): bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang
113a4('bum): ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
113a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig/lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
113a6('bum): la nan tan du gyis shig/ces bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod par
113a7('bum): 'gyur ro//kau shi ka dzaMm+bu gling gi sems can lha zhog gi/kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig
113b1('bum): gis/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
113b2('bum): mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi
113b3('bum): ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes
113b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig sgrogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du
113b5('bum): gyis shig ces bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka
113b6('bum): gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lha zhog gi/kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag
113b7('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang
114a1('bum): du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs/
114a2('bum): kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang bshad de bkrol zhing /rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan
114a3('bum): pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig stegs shig tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji
114a4('bum): sbyar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu
114a5('bum): phyin pa 'di las rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/kau shi ka
114a6('bum): stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na kau shi ka de ji
114a7('bum): snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom
114b1('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan//
114b2('bum): pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstun pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub
114b3('bum): par gyis shig/chongs shig lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ches de'i bsod
114b4('bum): nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
114b5('bum): 'bring po'i sems can rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
114b6('bum): mo la la zhig gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/
114b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
115a1('bum): phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang //
115a2('bum): 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan
115a3('bum): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/rgyan
115a4('bum): du zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog go/kau shi ka phyogs de du
115a5('bum): phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na//
115a6('bum): kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom
115a7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan
115b1('bum): pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis//
115b2('bum): shig/chongs shig/lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ces bsgo na/chas de'i bsod nams mang du
115b3('bum): 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gzhan yang dzam+bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs
115b4('bum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du
115b5('bum): 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
115b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /
115b7('bum): 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig/lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i
116a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ces bsgon ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
116a2('bum): 'di las lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shI ka dzam+bu gling gi sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten
116a3('bum): gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu
116a4('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau
116a5('bum): shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de
116a6('bum): bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis
116a7('bum): shig/chongs shig/lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ces bsgo na/ches de'i bsod
116b1('bum): nams mang du 'phel lo//dri ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shAka gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi
116b2('bum): khams kyi sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig
116b3('bum): gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom
116b4('bum): ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
116b5('bum): 'di/don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du chur
116b6('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig/lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes
116b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shog/ces bsgo na/chos de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las lan cig
117a1('bum): phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro/kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/stong gnyis kyi
117a2('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du
117a3('bum): sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan
117a4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan
117a5('bum): pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun
117a6('bum): chub par gyis shig/chongs shig/lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/nan tan du gyis shig/ces bsgo na/ches
117a7('bum): de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig
117b1('bum): rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am
117b2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel
117b3('bum): lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mi ga ragis//
117b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri/don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstun pa
117b5('bum): byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig/lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la
117b6('bum): gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na//kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol
117b7('bum): tu phyin pa 'di las lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/phyogs
118a1('bum): bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/lan cig phyir 'ong/
118a2('bum): ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde
118a3('bum): bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/yi ge dang ldan
118a4('bum): par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/gsal ba dang yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha
118a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig/lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/nan tan
118a6('bum): du gyis shig ces bsgo na/chos de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur
118a7('bum): ro//kau shaM ka gzhan yang dzam+bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems
118b1('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
118b2('bum): pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol
118b3('bum): zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig/
118b4('bum): lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir
118b5('bum): zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka dzam+bu gling gi sems can phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/kau
118b6('bum): shi ka gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi/sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la lo zhig gis/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji
118b7('bum): snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis
119a1('bum): bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de/
119a2('bum): bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung
119a3('bum): zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig/lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na//
119a4('bum): ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gling chen po pa bzhi'i
119a5('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
119a6('bum): bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam//
119a7('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes
119b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi go dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /
119b2('bum): 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig/lhogs shig tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan
119b3('bum): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig cig bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las phyir mi
119b4('bum): 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lha zhog gi/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i
119b5('bum): sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i
119b6('bum): bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu
119b7('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang
120a1('bum): dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig/lhogs shig
120a2('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe /kau shi ka/

120a5('bum): shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom

120b1('bum): zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig/lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ches de'i/
120b2('bum): bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
120b3('bum): khams kyi sems can phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu
