120b5('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha
120b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang 'di skad du tshur
120b7('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig/lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi
121a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgon/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/phyir/
121a2('bum): mi 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gzhan yang dzam+bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'ami rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod na/
121a3('bum): kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan
121a4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /
121a5('bum): bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis
121a6('bum): shig/tshangs shig/lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams
121a7('bum): mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dgra bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka dzam+bu gling gi sems can dgra bcom pa nyid
121b1('bum): la bkod pa lha zhog gi/kau shi ka gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod na//
121b2('bum): kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom
121b3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de
121b4('bum): bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshu ri rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub
121b5('bum): bar gyis shig chongs shig/lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na//ches de'i bsod nams mang
121b6('bum): du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dgra bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shr-i ka gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can dgra
121b7('bum): bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta zhog gi/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/dgra bcom pa nyid la
122a1('bum): rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //
122a2('bum): bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang
122a3('bum): ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod
122a4('bum): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig/lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
122a5('bum): tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/dgra bcom pa rnams
122a6('bum): yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta zhog gi/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems
122a7('bum): can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams
122b1('bum): de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu
122b2('bum): mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa
122b3('bum): byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar
122b4('bum): bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dgra
122b5('bum): bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shri ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta zhog gi/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
122b6('bum): gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod na/kaM shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
122b7('bum): mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs
123a1('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par
123a2('bum): phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig
123a3('bum): lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/chos de'i bsod nams mang du 'brel lo//
123a4('bum): dedo ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dgra bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
123a5('bum): sems can dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta zhog gi/phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
123a6('bum): bu mo la la zhig gis/dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lAm/gsol
123a7('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes
123b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad do bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang //
123b2('bum): 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan
123b3('bum): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
123b4('bum): las dgra bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gzhan yang dzam+b+ha gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/
123b5('bum): kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom
123b6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan
123b7('bum): pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun
124a1('bum): chub par gyis shig/tshangs shig lcogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces pa/
124a2('bum): na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka dzam+bu gling gi
124a3('bum): sems can rang byang chub la bkod pa lta zhog gi/kau sha~M ka gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rang
124a4('bum): byang chub la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde
124a5('bum): bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge
124a6('bum): dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang //yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod
124a7('bum): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
124b1('bum): tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par
124b2('bum): 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rang byang chub la bkod pa lta zhog gi/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi
124b3('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka do ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol
124b4('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
124b5('bum): phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du
124b6('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shos///
124b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rang sangs rgyas
125a1('bum): rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka stong gA 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can rang byang chub lta bkod pa lta zhog go/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
125a2('bum): 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de
125a3('bum): bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi kA de bas kyang
125a4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bya
125a5('bum): ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig lhogs
125a6('bum): shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig tsos bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir
125a7('bum): zhen/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can rang byang chub la
125b1('bum): bkod pa lta zhog gi/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de
125b2('bum): ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das
125b3('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /
125b4('bum): bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/
125b5('bum): tshangs shig lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nAn tan du gyis shig ces bsgon/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//
125b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rang
125b7('bum): byang chubo la bkod pa lta zhog gi/phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis
126a1('bum): rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan
126a2('bum): 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
126a3('bum): don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs
126a4('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig lcogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha
126a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rang sangs rgyas rnams
126a6('bum): yod par 'gyur ro///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po brgya so drug pa//kau shi ka gzhan yang dzam+bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag
126a7('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi//
126b1('bum): bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang
126b2('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba
126b3('bum): dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du
126b4('bum): yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan du byed pa de'i/
126b5('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/
126b6('bum): kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su
126b7('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
127a1('bum): par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems
127a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so//kau shi ka dzam+bu gling gi sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta zhog gi/kau shi ka gling chen po pa
127a3('bum): bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/
127a4('bum): kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang
127a5('bum): ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la
127a6('bum): rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung
127a7('bum): zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/rigs kyi bu khyod
127b1('bum): gang gi tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/shes rab kyi pha
127b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod
127b3('bum): kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod bla na
127b4('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/chos de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po
127b5('bum): bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so//kau shi ka gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par
127b6('bum): bskul ba byas pa lta zhog gi/kau shi ka sbyong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang
127b7('bum): dag par bskul ba byas na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs
128a1('bum): pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par
128a2('bum): gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
128a3('bum): phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/rigs
128a4('bum): kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/shes
128a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par
128a6('bum): gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs
128a7('bum): par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi
128b1('bum): ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so//kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
128b2('bum): tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta zhog gi/kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
128b3('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang
128b4('bum): ngodo//bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi
128b5('bum): ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab
128b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis
128b7('bum): shig/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/
129a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
129a2('bum): chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas
129a3('bum): kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i
129a4('bum): phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so//kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can bla na med pa
129a5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lha zhog gi/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
129a6('bum): bu mo la la zhig gos/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i
129a7('bum): rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
129b1('bum): bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yig dang ldan par gzhan la rgya tshor brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang //
129b2('bum): 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab
129b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
129b4('bum): slob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyis
129b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol
129b6('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/chos de'i bsod nams mang
129b7('bum): du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni/sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so//kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
130a1('bum): /khams kyi sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta zhog gi/kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/
130a2('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/kau shi ka de ji
130a3('bum): snum du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lama?/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das
130a4('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /
130a5('bum): bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/
130a6('bum): rmochongs shig lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bston pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
130a7('bum): phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob
130b1('bum): bar gyur pa de'i tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i cha/khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol
130b2('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
130b3('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
130b4('bum): dadapa' chen po rnams so//kau shi ka gzhan yang rngam+bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod no/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/
130b5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi
130b6('bum): ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye
130b7('bum): stegasal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig ltogs shig tshul bzhin
131a1('bum): du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
131a2('bum): na tan byed pa de'i tshe/rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod
131a3('bum): kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
131a4('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa de bos kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod bla na med pa yang
131a5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni/byang chub sems
131a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o//ko shi ka dzam+bu gling gi sems can rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi/gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi
131a7('bum): khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
131b1('bum): nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
131b2('bum): mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya tsher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par
131b3('bum): bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig
131b4('bum): ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nAn tan du gyis shig/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab
131b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro//
131b6('bum): gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod
131b7('bum): kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/chos
132a1('bum): de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o//kau shi ka rling
132a2('bum): chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi/kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am
132a3('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom
132a4('bum): ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang
132a5('bum): ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes
132a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis
132a7('bum): shig/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi
132b1('bum): bu khyod gang gi tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos
132b2('bum): rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi
132b3('bum): kau shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o//kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can phyir mi ldog
132b4('bum): pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog go/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam
132b5('bum): du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
132b6('bum): sprul pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol
132b7('bum): zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig lhogs
133a1('bum): shig tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha
133a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe//
133a3('bum): khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
133a4('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems
133a5('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o//kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems cadan phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
133a6('bum): rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i
133a7('bum): bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu
133b1('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan/
133b2('bum): pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan
133b3('bum): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol
133b4('bum): tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro//gang gi
133b5('bum): tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams
133b6('bum): mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o//kau shi ka stong gsum
133b7('bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi/kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can/
134a1('bum): ji snyed pa de dag/rigs kyi bu 'am rags kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de
134a2('bum): rgyas mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
134a3('bum): gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa
134a4('bum): dang /'di skad du chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i
134a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu
134a6('bum): byin pa la slob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe
134a7('bum): khyod kyis thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe//khyod blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgon/ches de'i bsod nams mang
134b1('bum): du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang dzam+bu gling gi
134b2('bum): sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/shes rab kyi pha rol

135a2('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig

135a6('bum): bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa

136a5('bum): rnam par pa ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung zhig/kun chub par gyis/shig/chongs shig/

138a6('bum): par rgya cher bstan na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//kau shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par

138b1('bum): chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/yi ge dang

138b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan po dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa bas/de'i nang
139a1('bum): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen gro la la zhig 'di skad du/bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes/

139a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /

139b1('bum): dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher bstan na/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can

139b4('bum): la zhig gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas

139b7('bum): mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o de dag ni nges pa ste/rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhol zhing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
140a1('bum): phyir ldog par mi 'gyur bas na/de dag la ni gdod chos bstan kyang mi dgos kyi/'di ni 'khor ba las byung bar 'dod la/snying rje chen pos mnar ba'i phyir ro//de nas lha'i
140a2('bum): dbang po brgya byin gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
140a3('bum): byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa/de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar tshul khrims
140a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
140a5('bum): la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams
140a6('bum): shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar nang stong pa nyid la gdams
140a7('bum): shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar phyi stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de
140b1('bum): ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar chen pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes
140b2('bum): su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar
140b3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar dor ba med pa stong
140b4('bum): pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan
140b5('bum): par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar
140b6('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
140b7('bum): nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//yang dag par
141a1('bum): spong ba rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par 'gyi'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gdabs shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//dbang po rnams la gdams shing rjes su
141a2('bum): bstan par bgyi'o//stobs rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par 'gyi'o//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
141a3('bum): pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//bsam gtan rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//tshad med pa rnams
141a4('bum): la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//rnam par thar pa brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan par
141a5('bum): bgyi'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la gdams shing rjes
141a6('bum): su bstan par bgyi'o//mngon par shes pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//ting nge 'dzin rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gdams
141a7('bum): shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//mi 'jigs pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//so so
141b1('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//byams pa chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//snying rje chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//sangs
141b2('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal cha dang /nad kyi rkyen sman dang /yo byad kyis kyang rjes su bzung bar bgyi ste/byang
141b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la chos kyis bsdu ba dang /zang zing gis bsdu bas rjes su 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/rigs kyi bu
141b4('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag gi ni ma lags so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni yong yang de ltar 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang lags pa de ni/sbyin pa'i
141b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//brtson
141b6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su
141b7('bum): bstan pa'o//nang stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//phyi stong pa nyid la gdamos shing rjes su bstan pa'o//phyi nang stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//stong pa nyid stong
142a1('bum): pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//chen po stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//don dam pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//'dus
142a2('bum): byas stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//thog
142a3('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//
142a4('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan
142a5('bum): pa'o//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing
142a6('bum): rjes su bstan pa'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//yang dag par spong ba rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
142a7('bum): la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//dbang po rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//stobs rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gdams
142b1('bum): shing rjes su bstan pa'o//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//bsam gtan rnams la
142b2('bum): gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//tshad med pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//rnam par thar
142b3('bum): pa brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa
142b4('bum): med pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//mngon par shes pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//ting nge 'dzin rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//gzungs kyi sgo rnams la
142b5('bum): gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//so so yang dag par
142b6('bum): rig pa bzhi la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//byams pa chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//snying rje chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
142b7('bum): pabaco brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la smras pa/kau shi ka khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa bskyed pa dang /byang
143a1('bum): chub sems dpa' rnams la phan 'dogs pa dang /yongs su skyob pa legs so legs so//kau shi ka khyod kyis de bzhin du bya'o//'phags pa nyan thos gang sems can rnams la
143a2('bum): phan 'dogs par 'dod pa des kyang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos pa bskyed par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams zang zing
143a3('bum): dang chos kyis phan gdags pas phan gdags shing yongs su bskyang bar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems
143a4('bum): dpa' chen po de dag las 'byung ngo //gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi bskyod na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
143a5('bum): chen po/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
143a6('bum): dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la slob pa ma yin/nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen
143a7('bum): po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
143b1('bum): dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
143b2('bum): dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams
143b3('bum): da /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /
143b4('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang
143b5('bum): smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag
143b6('bum): par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa ma yin te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'ching rgya bar mi 'gyur ro//bla na med pa
143b7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur na/rang sangs rgyas dang /nyan thos rnams kyang yod par mi 'gyur te/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
144a1('bum): chen po ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam
144a2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la'ang slob la/nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong
144a3('bum): pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
144a4('bum): nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong
144a5('bum): pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang
144a6('bum): po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad
144a7('bum): med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo
144b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /
144b2('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la'ang slob pas/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa
144b3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
144b4('bum): pu sems can dmyal ba rnams kyang rgyun chud par 'gyur ro//byol song gi skye gnas rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur ro//gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur ro//lha ma yin gyi ris
144b5('bum): kyang yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ro//lha'i ris kyang mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro//rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams
144b6('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rgyal chen bzhi'i ras kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sum cu rtsa gsum
144b7('bum): kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mtshe ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig
145a1('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshangs ras kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshangs lha nyo na bya/
145a2('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//snang ba'i lha
145a3('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams
145a4('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du
145a5('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dag rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tsha ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//chang
145a6('bum): med che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mi che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mi gdung ba'i lha
145a7('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'og min gyi lha rnams
145b1('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
145b2('bum): cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig
145b3('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig
145b4('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung
145b5('bum): bar 'gyur ro//phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//chen po stong pa nyid
145b6('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
145b7('bum): 'gyur ro//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
146a1('bum): 'gyur ro//rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du
146a2('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
146a3('bum): 'gyur ro//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du
146a4('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bya
146a5('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
146a6('bum): ro//bsam gtan rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshad med pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
146a7('bum): ro/rnam par thar pa brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
146b1('bum): ma med pa dang smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi sgo rnams
146b2('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
146b3('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//nyan thos kyi theg pa 'jig rten du 'byung
146b4('bum): bar 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//theg pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/brgya byin gyi
146b5('bum): le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po brgya so bdun pa//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas
146b6('bum): gnas brtan rab 'byor la smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems
146b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
147a1('bum): bsngo ba gang yin pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /rang sangs
147a2('bum): rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang /tshul khrims las byung ba dang bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin
147a3('bum): pa dag las/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
147a4('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa 'di nyid rab ces bya'o//dam pa zhes bya'o//gtso bo zhes bya'o//mchog ces bya'o//phul zhes bya'o//gya nom pa zhes bya'o//bla na med pa zhes bya'o//gong na
147a5('bum): med pa zhes bya'o//mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung
147a6('bum): ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /tshul khrims las byung ba dang /bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ni/bdag gdul ba dang /bdag zhi bar bya ba dang /bodag yongs su mya
147a7('bum): ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir/nye bar gnas pa ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub
147b1('bum): kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam
147b2('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /mngon
147b3('bum): par shes pa drug dag kyang /bdag gdul ba dang /bdag zhi bar bya ba dang /bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir/nye bar gnas par zad kyi/byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad
147b4('bum): gdul ba dang /zhi bar bya ba dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
147b5('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so//de ltar byang chub sems
147b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs
147b7('bum): su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gi/'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs
148a1('bum): med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gi/'jig rten gyi khams re
148a2('bum): rer yang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa dag
148a3('bum): gi/'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grungs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
148a4('bum): khams grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re ra yang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang /
148a5('bum): shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gi/'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya
148a6('bum): ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang /sangs rgyas bcom
148a7('bum): ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig
148b1('bum): rten po khams rar yang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med chad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'angs par gyur pa de dag dang /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshod mod dpan
148b2('bum): tu med pa dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang /stong gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
148b3('bum): med tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med chad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/
148b4('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang /phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi dam pa'i
148b5('bum): chos nub kyi bar du/dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs po de dag gis/sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i
148b6('bum): dngos po dang /tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /slob pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa dag dang /mi
148b7('bum): slob pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa dag dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /
149a1('bum): shes rab kyi phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang /phan par bzhed pa dang /thugs rje chen po dang /sangs
149a2('bum): rgyas kyi chos grangs med tshad med pa dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa dang /chos bstan pa de la bslabs shing /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang/
149a3('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa dang /rang byang chub thob pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa
149a4('bum): la zhugs pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang /gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag bzhugs kyang rung /yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba gang
149a5('bum): ji snyed cig bskyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog/gtso bo dam pa rab/phul gya nom pa bla na med pa gong na med pa/mnyam pa med pa/mi mnyam pa dang /
149a6('bum): mnyam pas rjes su yi rang ba ste/de ltar rjes su yi rang nas/rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/bla na med pa
149a7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub grub par gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa des
149b1('bum): de skad du smras te sems kyi rnam pa de lta bus yongs su bsngos na dmigs pa gang dang /dngos po gang gis/sems de lta bu skyes par gyur pa'i dngos po de dag dang /dmigs pa de dag/rigs kyi
149b2('bum): bu de dag gis/ji ltar mtshan mar byas pa de bzhin du dmigs pa yod pa yin nam/byams pas smras pa/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis/ji ltar mtshan mar byas
149b3('bum): te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du dngos po de dag dang /dmigs pa de dag dmigs su yod pa ma yin no//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/gal te de//
149b4('bum): ltar dngos po med pa dag dmigs pa med pas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa de dag dang de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed po nas/dam pa'i chos gnas
149b5('bum): pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang /slob pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji
149b6('bum): skyed pa dang mi slob pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mtshan ma'i tshul gyis/yongs su bsngos na/ji ltar
149b7('bum): mi rtag pa la rtag go zhes bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang /sems phyin ci log dang /lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang /sdug bsngal ba la bde zhes bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang /sems phyin
150a1('bum): ci log dang /lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang /bdag med pa la bdag ces bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang /sems phyin ci log dang /lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang /mig tsang
150a2('bum): bal gtsang ba zhes bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang sems phyin ci log dang /lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang /de ltar de'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu mgyur tam/de ltar yin yang thams cad dngos pa
150a3('bum): ji lta ba dang /dmigs pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/sems kyang de bzhin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
150a4('bum): dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/gzugs dang tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /
150a5('bum): rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin/mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang lus dang /yid kyang de bzhin/gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg dang /chos kyang de bzhin/khams dang skye
150a6('bum): mched dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'ang de bzhin/nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/byi stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/chen
150a7('bum): po stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/
150b1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang de
150b2('bum): bzhin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/dran pa nye bar bzhag
150b3('bum): pa rnams kyang de bzhin/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang de bzhin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang de bzhin/dbang po rnams kyang de bzhin/stobs rnams kyang de bzhin/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
150b4('bum): kyang de bzhin/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang de bzhin/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang de bzhin/bsam gtan rnams kyang de bzhin/tshad med pa rnams kyang de bzhin/gzugs med
150b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang de bzhin/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang de bzhin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang de bzhin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
150b6('bum): ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'ang de bzhin/mngon par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang de bzhin/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang de bzhin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
150b7('bum): 'ang de bzhin/mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang de bzhin/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang de bzhin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin te/gal te de ltar dngos po ji lta ba dang /
151a1('bum): dmigs pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/sems kyang de bzhin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/brjod pa'i/
151a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/bsdam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/nang stong pa nyid kyang
151a3('bum): de bzhin/phyi stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/chen po stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/'dus
151a4('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/thog ma drang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/dor ba med pa stong
151a5('bum): pa nyid kyang de bzhin/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/dngos po
151a6('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang de bzhin/yang dag par spong ba
151a7('bum): rnams kyang de bzhin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang de bzhin/dbang po rnams kyang de bzhin/stobs rnams kyang de bzhin/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang de bzhin/'phags pa'i lam
151b1('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'ang de bzhin/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang de bzhin/bsam gtan rnams kyang de bzhin/tshad med pa rnams kyang de bzhin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
151b2('bum): kyang de bzhin/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang de bzhin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang de bzhin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'ang
151b3('bum): de bzhin/mngon par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang de bzhin/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang de bzhin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang de bzhin/mi 'jigs pa
151b4('bum): bzhi 'ang de bzhin/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'ang de bzhin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang de bzhin na ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i
151b5('bum): dngos po de ni gang zhig yin/dmigs pa de ni gang zhig yin/byang chub de ni gang zhig yin/sems de ni gang zhig yin/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni gang zhig yin/rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i
151b6('bum): bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de ni gang zhig yin/byams pas smras pa/gal te byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa/sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur cing /dge ba'i rtsa
151b7('bum): ba bskyed par gyur pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang yongs su zin pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la bslabs pa dag ni/dngos po de dag dang /dmigs
152a1('bum): pa de dag dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag mtshan mar byas shing //
152a2('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su mi bsngo'i//de dag ni 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/gnyis kyi tshul gyis ma yin no//gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no//mtshan
152a3('bum): mi'i tshul gyis ma yin no//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no//dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no//dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no//nyon mongs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no//
152a4('bum): rnam par byang ba'i tshul gyis ma yin no//skye ba'i tshul gyis ma yin no//'gag pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no//gal te byang chub sems dpa' de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa'ang ma yin//
152a5('bum): sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa'ang ma yin/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa'ang ma yin/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'ang ma yin/rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i
152a6('bum): chos thams cad la bslabs par gyur pa'ang ma yin na/de dag ni dngos po de dag dang /dmigs pa de dag dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /rjes su yi rang ba dang
152a7('bum): ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag la mtshan mar byas shing /bla na med pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar 'gyur te/btsun pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa
152b1('bum): ni/theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni/theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun
152b2('bum): du mi bshad do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni/theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni/
152b3('bum): theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni/theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi
152b4('bum): bshad do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni/theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mdun du mi bshad do//nang stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/theg pa la gsar du/
152b5('bum): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do//phyi stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do//phyi nang stong pa nyid de ltar
152b6('bum): bstan pa ni/thog pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun
152b7('bum): du mi bshad do//chen po stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du ma bshad do//don dam pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/theg pa la gsar
153a1('bum): du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do//'dus byas stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do//
153a2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/theg pa la gsar du
